Maaaas me controlei porque queria que o algoritmo das plataformas trabalhassem por mim um cadim. 
E assim foi… no dia seguinte começaram a aparecer vários modelos idênticos e com vários preços. 
Resultado: paguei R$240 por 3 unidades. 

(Agora é rezar pra não chegar nada verde e de plástico 😮‍💨😬)

Entrei no ML e na Shopee e fiquei uns 2 dias pesquisando. 
No primeiro dia eu já achei um modelo 95% INGUAL, por 187 dinheiros. 
Ai já estava me sentindo o carinha do Insta lá…

Vi um gancho liiindo para pendurar toalha, mas o preço era 😮‍💨. No site de uma loja aqui do BR tava 319,00 a UNIDADE. 
Então, eu peguei meu compiuter e fui a caça. Afinal, era um pendurador de latão, poxa. Num era pussilviu que não ia ter uma lujinha da chine com algo parecido.

record.text: Safaricom’s 10% Okoa Jahazi and Okoa Data access fee helped the telco earn KES 12.31 billion in FY2025, but it’s an unfair charge on loyal customers who already generate revenue through calls and data. Here’s why the fee makes no sense and should be scrapped.

external.description: Safaricom is a behemoth of Kenyan finance and connectivity, a company so successful that its operations often feel like a utility, and the recent 2025 Annual Report confirms its continued, phenomenal revenue growth. Yet, buried within the report is a stark reminder of a financial practice that is not just petty, but arguably exploitative: the mandatory 10% access fee charged on emergency services like Okoa Jahazi (airtime) and Okoa Data (data bundles). The company’s financial statements confirm that the access fees from these "emergency top-up services" are grouped into the "Other service revenue" category , which, for the Group, stood at a significant KES 12.31 billion in FY2025.
external.title: Okoa Jahazi and Okoa Data are Safaricom’s silent profit engines

📣 New Podcast! "Forgetting Is a SUPERPOWER: How Losing Memories Makes You Smarter" on @Spreaker #activeforgetting #brainhacks #brainscience #cognitivescience #ebbinghaus #forgetting #forgettingcurve #howthebrainworks #learning #learnsomethingnew #memory #memoryloss #microglia #mindblown

external.description:
What if I told you that forgetting isn't a failure of your brain, but one of its most brilliant features? For over a century, we've been haunted by the "forgetting curve," the idea that our memory is a leaky bucket, passively losing information over time. But what if your brain isn't losing memories—what if it's actively deleting them on purpose?

This podcast rewrites the story of forgetting. We'll journey into the cutting edge of neuroscience to reveal that forgetting is an active, adaptive form of learning. Your brain is constantly "pruning" less reliable memories to make you a more efficient, faster, and better decision-maker. We'll uncover the hidden world of synaptic elimination, where cellular janitors called microglia clean up old connections, and explore how this active forgetting process is crucial for a healthy mind.

From the historical theories of Hermann Ebbinghaus to the modern labs studying the complement system, we’ll explore the very mechanisms that decide which memories get to stay and which ones are cast aside. We'll also investigate the dark side: what happens when this finely-tuned system goes wrong, leading to pathological memory loss in conditions like Alzheimer's disease. This isn't just about why you can't find your keys; it's about the fundamental process that shapes who you are.

Ready to rethink everything you thought you knew about memory? Subscribe now to learn why forgetting might be the most important thing your brain does all day.
external.title: Forgetting Is a SUPERPOWER: How Losing Memories Makes You Smarter

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "The Bryan Johnson Experiment: Can You Really Live FOREVER?" on @Spreaker #antiaging #biohacker #biohacking #blueprintprotocol #bryanjohnson #caloricrestriction #dontdie #ethics #future #futureofhealth #healthoptimization #healthpodcast #immortality #longevity #newpodcast

external.description:
What if you could stop aging? Tech millionaire Bryan Johnson is spending millions a year on "Blueprint," a radical, data-driven longevity protocol to do just that. With a team of doctors, a massive daily supplement stack, and a hyper-strict vegan diet, his goal is simple: "Don't Die." But is this the next evolution for humanity, or the obsessive quest of one man trying to outrun the inevitable?

This podcast goes beyond the headlines to give you the complete, unvarnished story of the Blueprint protocol. We’ll dive into Johnson's official documentation and his core philosophy of "Zeroism"—the quest to bridge our fragile human existence to a superintelligent future. We'll explore the science, the supplements, and the ambitious goal of achieving "species maximization."

Then, we pull back the curtain on the controversy. We'll take you inside the explosive Reddit discussions where healthcare professionals and critics question the healthiness of his methods, from extreme caloric restriction to his low body fat. We'll also examine the tough questions raised about his quality of life and the ethics of turning life extension into a commercial enterprise. Finally, we ask the question that affects us all: in a world of limited resources, what is the ecological and social cost of radically extended lifespans?

Is Bryan Johnson a visionary pioneer showing us the future, or a cautionary tale about losing your life in the quest to save it? Subscribe now to join the ultimate debate on the future of human existence and decide for yourself.
external.title: The Bryan Johnson Experiment: Can You Really Live FOREVER?

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "The TIME Thief: Why Your Brain is STEALING Your Years" on @Spreaker #aging #brainhacks #brainscience #internalclock #learnsomethingnew #lifehacks #memory #mindfulness #mindhacks #neuroscience #newpodcast #personaldevelopment #psychology #psychologyfacts #sciencepodcast

external.description:
Remember when summer vacations felt like an eternity? Now, you blink and a whole year is gone. What if I told you it's not just in your head? Your brain is actively stealing your time, and this episode is the masterclass on how to steal it back. We’re diving deep into the bizarre and fascinating psychology of time perception to answer the one question we all ask: Why does time speed up so much as we age?

This isn't just about feeling old; it's about hard science. We'll uncover how your brain’s "autopilot mode," driven by a repetitive daily life, stops recording new memories, effectively deleting weeks and months from your perceived experience. We'll explore the shocking biological truth of how your internal clock slows down as you age, partly due to a drop in the production of those crucial feel-good chemicals that make moments memorable. And we’ll demystify the mind-bending "fraction effect," which mathematically explains why each year feels shorter than the last.

But this isn't a doom-and-gloom discussion. The second half of this episode is your personal toolkit for reclaiming your life from the acceleration of time. We’ll give you actionable, science-backed strategies to slow down time, from learning difficult skills to introducing tiny, novel experiences into your routine. It's time to force your brain out of its rut and start living in a world where the good times actually last.

Ready to make your life feel longer and more vibrant? You can't afford to waste another second. Hit play and learn how to become the master of your own clock.
external.title: The TIME Thief: Why Your Brain is STEALING Your Years

It's time to force your brain out of its rut and start living in a world where the good times actually last.

Ready to make your life feel longer and more vibrant? You can't afford to waste another second. Hit play and learn how to become the master of your own clock.
external.title: The TIME Thief: Why Your Brain is STEALING Your Years

Notion可以當作行事曆嗎？

在台灣，Notion不僅是筆記與資料庫的工具，對於尋求統一日程的團隊也相當友善。透過日曆視圖、任務分解、提醒與模板，能把會議、截止日、專案里程碑放在同一個介面，減少跨平台切換。與Google日曆或Office整合後，行事流程更連貫，特別適合新創、教學與遠距團隊在地化使用。對於需要遵守企業流程與資料安全的台灣中小企業，Notion也提供權限管控與多裝置同步，提升合規與效率。

Notion可以用來管理個人財務嗎？

在台灣，個人財務往往分散於多家銀行、信用卡與行動支付。Notion以資料庫、表格與模板，能把收入、支出、投資與儲蓄目標全都串聯起來，輕鬆產出月度報表，方便申報所得與清算稅務。透過自訂分類與公式，還能對比實際支出與預算差異、追蹤目標進度。若你追求專業與彈性，Notion是相對低成本且高度客製的解決方案，特別適合台灣使用者的在地需求。

record.text:
Stable Diffusion 的outpainting 功能是什麼？

Stable Diffusion 的 outpainting 功能，能在不受原圖尺寸限制的情況下，向四周延展畫面、補充邊界細節，讓整體風格與光影更連貫。對台灣的插畫、廣告與數位內容創作者而言，能以同一風格延伸海報、封面，提升產出效率、降低修圖成本。它透過條件提示與掩模控制，避免不相關元素介入，並善用本地模板與資料庫，協助工作室快速因應客製需求，推動教育、博物館展覽與電商的創新表現。

VimConf 2025 small に運営として参加しました
VimConf 2025 smallに運営スタッフとして参加した筆者が、イベントの内容を報告する。
AIによるプログラミングが普及する中、Vimはコード作成よりもレビューや読み込みのエディタとして役割を変えていくという将来像が示された。
また、Vimの核となる機能「ドットリピート（.）」について、その仕組みとプラグインによる利用時の課題が詳細に議論され、本体への改善提案が行われた。
小規模開催ながら参加者の熱意は高く、Vimコミュニティの活発さと将来の国際会議開催への期待が述べられた。

GitHub Universe 2025の主要アップデートは、AI機能の抜本的な強化である。
Copilot Coding Agentは、複数のエージェントを統率する「Agent HQ」を中心に、カスタム化、セルフホスト化、PR修正の委任が可能となった。

サンワダイレクトのキャスター付オットマンは、その悩みを解決する頼もしい存在です。

足の置き場に困らず、高さも自由自在。キャスターで必要な時にスッと引き寄せ、リラックスできますよ。

集中力アップにも繋がる快適さを、ぜひ体験してください。

https://amzn.to/4hr5oIF

#PR #オットマン #デスク環境 #フットレスト

開発者の皆さん、長時間作業での身体の負担、感じていませんか？

生産性を向上させつつ健康も守るなら、「エルゴノミクスキーボード」がおすすめです。手首や腕の自然な配置を促し、タイピング時の負担を大幅に軽減します。特に分割型や湾曲型は、姿勢の改善にも繋がり、腱鞘炎や肩こりの予防に効果的です。集中力も持続しやすくなりますよ。

快適なデスク環境で、あなたの開発効率を次のレベルへ引き上げましょう。

#デスクガジェット #エルゴノミクス #開発効率 #生産性向上

長時間のコーディング作業で、首や肩に疲れを感じていませんか？

快適な開発環境は生産性を劇的に向上させます。話題のデスクガジェットとして注目すべきは『モニターアーム』。ディスプレイを最適な高さと角度に自由に調整できるため、自然な姿勢を保て、目の疲れも軽減します。デスク上もスッキリ片付き、集中力アップにも繋がります。

小さな投資で、あなたの開発ライフを劇的に改善しましょう。

It should take the opportunity to apply the same standard to all big US companies, even those staying private.

הנזיר הסיר את ידו ממצחי. "סיימנו, ילדי", אמר, וחשבתי שראיתי לרגע את הרוח הקסומה מקיפה את ידו לפני שהכניס את ידו לשק והיא נעלמה.

"זה הכל?" נדהמתי להיפרד כך ממי שהיה חלק ממני כל חיי.

"אה, עוד משהו קטן..." הנזיר הניח יד על לחיי וחשתי את צלקת הלידה שלי נעלמת. "הבן, אני אוסף בולים."

זה קצת יותר כמו מישהו שאמר "שיישרף לכם הכפר" ואז מסביר שהכוונה היא לבסיסי החמאס וזה לא מכוון להרג אזרחים. 

זה לא מתאים למשמעות הסטנדרטית של הביטוי וגם לא לפשט שלו. אז למה השתמשת בו מלכתחילה?

record.text: 記事の要約: デジタル庁は11月4日、iPhoneでのマイナンバーカード利用に関するシステム障害が復旧し、正常に申請できるようになったと発表しました。この障害は10月30日の朝から発生し、新規発行申請が完了できない状態が続いていました。障害は午前8時50分ごろに始まり、午後10時には申請受付が停止され、システムはメンテナンスモードに移行しました。同日、Android端末でも同様の障害が発生しましたが、デジタル庁は両者の関連性は確認されておらず、単なる偶然の可能性が高いとしています。
